instruction: Generate a natural description from the given structured data.
input: Name: The Golden Palace | Type: Restaurant | Food: Chinese | Price Range: Moderate | Customer Rating: 4.5/5
output: The Golden Palace is a restaurant that serves Chinese food at moderate prices. It has received a customer rating of 4.5 out of 5 stars.
reference: The Golden Palace is a Chinese restaurant offering moderately priced meals. Customers have rated it highly at 4.5 out of 5 stars.

instruction: Convert the following data into a fluent sentence.
input: Player: Michael Jordan | Sport: Basketball | Team: Chicago Bulls | Championships: 6 | MVP Awards: 5
output: Michael Jordan played basketball for the Chicago Bulls and won 6 championships and 5 MVP awards.
reference: Michael Jordan, a basketball player for the Chicago Bulls, achieved 6 championships and earned 5 MVP awards during his career.

instruction: Write a description based on the product information provided.
input: Product: Wireless Headphones | Brand: SoundMax | Battery Life: 30 hours | Noise Cancellation: Yes | Price: $149.99
output: SoundMax Wireless Headphones offer 30 hours of battery life and feature noise cancellation technology, priced at $149.99.
reference: The SoundMax Wireless Headphones come with an impressive 30-hour battery life and active noise cancellation, available for $149.99.

instruction: Generate a natural language summary from the weather data.
input: Location: New York City | Temperature: 72°F | Condition: Partly Cloudy | Humidity: 65% | Wind: 10 mph
output: In New York City, the temperature is 72 degrees Fahrenheit with partly cloudy skies. The humidity level is at 65 percent and winds are blowing at 10 miles per hour.
reference: New York City is experiencing partly cloudy weather with a temperature of 72°F. The humidity stands at 65% with winds at 10 mph.

instruction: Create a description from the book information.
output: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone is a fantasy novel written by J.K. Rowling, published in 1997. The book has 309 pages and has sold over 120 million copies worldwide.
reference: J.K. Rowling's Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone, a 309-page fantasy novel published in 1997, has achieved remarkable success with over 120 million copies sold globally.

instruction: Transform the movie data into a readable description.
input: Title: The Shawshank Redemption | Director: Frank Darabont | Year: 1994 | Genre: Drama | Rating: 9.3/10 | Runtime: 142 minutes
output: The Shawshank Redemption, directed by Frank Darabont in 1994, is a drama film that runs for 142 minutes and has an impressive rating of 9.3 out of 10.
reference: Directed by Frank Darabont, The Shawshank Redemption (1994) is a 142-minute drama that has earned an outstanding 9.3/10 rating.

instruction: Generate a sentence describing the university statistics.
input: University: Stanford | Founded: 1885 | Students: 17,000 | Faculty: 2,300 | Campus Size: 8,180 acres
output: Stanford University was founded in 1885 and currently has 17,000 students and 2,300 faculty members on its 8,180-acre campus.
reference: Founded in 1885, Stanford University hosts 17,000 students and employs 2,300 faculty members across its expansive 8,180-acre campus.

instruction: Convert the company data into a natural description.
input: Company: Tesla Inc. | Industry: Automotive | Founded: 2003 | CEO: Elon Musk | Headquarters: Austin, Texas | Employees: 127,000
output: Tesla Inc. is an automotive company founded in 2003, led by CEO Elon Musk. The company is headquartered in Austin, Texas and employs approximately 127,000 people.
reference: Founded in 2003, Tesla Inc. is an automotive company headquartered in Austin, Texas. Under CEO Elon Musk's leadership, the company employs around 127,000 people.

instruction: Write a description from the hotel information.
input: Hotel: Seaside Resort | Location: Miami Beach | Rooms: 250 | Amenities: Pool, Spa, Restaurant | Price per Night: $280 | Rating: 4.7/5
output: Seaside Resort is located in Miami Beach and offers 250 rooms with amenities including a pool, spa, and restaurant. Rooms cost $280 per night and the hotel has a rating of 4.7 out of 5.
reference: The Seaside Resort in Miami Beach features 250 rooms and provides amenities such as a pool, spa, and restaurant. Priced at $280 per night, it boasts a 4.7/5 rating.

instruction: Generate text from the athlete's profile.
output: Serena Williams is a professional tennis player from the United States. She has won 23 Grand Slam singles titles and is considered one of the greatest athletes of all time.
reference: American professional tennis player Serena Williams has claimed 23 Grand Slam singles titles, establishing herself as one of the greatest athletes in history.

instruction: Create a description from the smartphone specifications.
input: Model: Galaxy S24 | Brand: Samsung | Display: 6.2 inches | Storage: 256GB | Camera: 50MP | Battery: 4000mAh | Price: $899
output: The Samsung Galaxy S24 features a 6.2-inch display, 256GB of storage, a 50-megapixel camera, and a 4000mAh battery. It is priced at $899.
reference: Samsung's Galaxy S24 comes with a 6.2-inch display, 256GB storage capacity, 50MP camera, and 4000mAh battery, available for $899.

instruction: Transform the scientific data into natural language.
input: Planet: Mars | Distance from Sun: 142 million miles | Diameter: 4,212 miles | Moons: 2 | Day Length: 24.6 hours | Year Length: 687 Earth days
output: Mars is located 142 million miles from the Sun and has a diameter of 4,212 miles. The planet has 2 moons, a day lasting 24.6 hours, and orbits the Sun in 687 Earth days.
reference: Situated 142 million miles from the Sun, Mars has a diameter of 4,212 miles and is orbited by 2 moons. A Martian day is 24.6 hours long, while its year spans 687 Earth days.

instruction: Generate a description from the restaurant review data.
input: Restaurant: Bella Italia | Cuisine: Italian | Location: Downtown Boston | Average Rating: 4.6/5 | Average Price: $45 per person | Popular Dish: Linguine alle Vongole
output: Bella Italia is an Italian restaurant in Downtown Boston with an average rating of 4.6 out of 5 stars. The average meal costs $45 per person, and their most popular dish is Linguine alle Vongole.
reference: Located in Downtown Boston, Bella Italia serves Italian cuisine and holds a 4.6/5 rating. With an average price of $45 per person, the restaurant is famous for its Linguine alle Vongole.

instruction: Convert the flight information into a readable format.
input: Flight: AA 1234 | Airline: American Airlines | Departure: New York JFK at 8:30 AM | Arrival: Los Angeles LAX at 11:45 AM | Duration: 5 hours 15 minutes | Status: On Time
output: American Airlines flight AA 1234 departs from New York JFK at 8:30 AM and arrives at Los Angeles LAX at 11:45 AM. The flight duration is 5 hours and 15 minutes, and it is currently on time.
reference: Flight AA 1234, operated by American Airlines, leaves New York JFK at 8:30 AM and reaches Los Angeles LAX at 11:45 AM after a 5-hour 15-minute journey. The flight status is on time.

instruction: Write a description based on the historical event data.
output: The Apollo 11 mission successfully landed the first humans on the Moon on July 20, 1969. Astronauts Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin spent approximately 21 hours on the lunar surface before returning to Earth.
reference: On July 20, 1969, the Apollo 11 mission achieved the historic first human Moon landing. Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin remained on the lunar surface for about 21 hours before their return journey to Earth.

instruction: Generate text from the car specifications.
input: Make: Toyota | Model: Camry | Year: 2024 | Engine: 2.5L 4-Cylinder | Horsepower: 203 hp | Fuel Economy: 32 mpg combined | Price: $28,500
output: The 2024 Toyota Camry is equipped with a 2.5-liter 4-cylinder engine producing 203 horsepower. It achieves 32 miles per gallon combined fuel economy and is priced at $28,500.
reference: Toyota's 2024 Camry features a 2.5L 4-cylinder engine delivering 203 hp and offers a combined fuel economy of 32 mpg. The vehicle is available for $28,500.
